prod_desc: Chill out with frozen yogurt at Heartlake’s coolest hangout!
prod_long_desc:
The LEGO® Friends Heartlake Frozen Yogurt Shop comes with a frozen yogurt machine with self-serve function, bar with a choice of toppings, weighing scales, phone to take orders, inside seating area and outside table with a parasol. There’s also a drive thru with ordering station and a cool yellow car with room to carry your frozen yogurt on the back. Includes 2 mini-doll figures.
Includes Olivia and Julian mini-doll figures.
Features a frozen yogurt shop with a self-serve machine, toppings bar, weighing scales, phone, table and chairs, drive thru with ordering point, outside table with parasol and a car.
Accessory elements include a range of toppings, sauce bottles, glasses, bowls and cones.
Drive with Olivia to the frozen yogurt shop and place your order at the order point.
Help Julian run the shop, taking orders over the phone and chatting to customers.
Use the machine with self-serve function to serve the frozen yogurt and then choose from all the delicious toppings at the bar.
Frozen yogurt shop with drive thru measures over 5” high, 11” wide and 4” long.
Car measures over 1” high, 3” long and 1” wide.
